sentences.sContent: I wore a maroon velvet trouser suit that my daughter chose, and most of the village came to the reception.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wore a maroon velvet trouser suit that my daughter chose, and most of the village came to the reception.
sentences.sCn: 那天，我穿了女儿为我挑选的栗色天鹅绒裤装，村庄里的大多数人都应邀参加了我的婚礼。

sentences.sContent: On an impulse I grab a little maroon dress, pull Christiane from Frau Ballin's arms—she is still wearing only her undergarments—and quickly dress her in it.
sentences.sContent_eng: On an impulse I grab a little maroon dress, pull Christiane from Frau Ballin's arms—she is still wearing only her undergarments—and quickly dress her in it.
sentences.sCn: 慌乱中，我随手抓起一件栗色的连衣裙，给在巴林女士怀里的克丽丝汀换上，——可怜的克丽丝汀，她还穿着那件薄衬衣。

synos.tran: 栗色；逃亡黑人奴隶；孤立的人
